title: Hundreds of raw T cards FS
author: scottglevy

posts.post_title: Hundreds of raw T cards FS
posts.post_content:
PLEASE SEE REPLIES FOR ADDITIONAL SCANS

Scarce backs T206 lot - $225 for 8 cards
1 EPDG - Delehanty - Poor
7 Tolstoi:
- Joss Pitching - Poor
- Chase trophy - Poor
- Steinfeldt batting - VERY Poor
- Conroy batting - Poor
- Lattimore - Fair
- Street - Good
- O'leary hands on knee - VG

All Remaining cards are common backs:
Cobb bat on - F/G (maybe close to Good) - $SOLD
Cobb red port - Fair+ (just slightly worse than bat on) - $475
Mordecai Brown Chi - Ex/mt corners - but a crease and paper separation on back prob. make it F/G - $75
Persons VG+ - $100
Howard VG+ - $100
Sweeney Boston (missing nearly all of the red ink - vague outline still apparent) G/VG - $200


SL Lot - 13 cards (no back damage) - $625 
Shaughnessy - Poor
Bastian - Poor
Bay - Poor
Guiheen - Poor
Paige - F/G
Carey - Poor (probably handcut)
Reagan - Good
Purdue - Poor
Greminger - Poor
Lafitte - Fair
Fritz - Poor
Ryan - Poor
Hickman - Fair 

Mixed Tcard SUPER BEATERS - 12cards - $100
(these cards are BAD but are at least 85% complete except for mystery player)
- T206 Bresnahan Port
- T206 Jackson Port
- T206 Bridwell no cap
- T206 Dahlen Boston
- T206 McIntyre Hands above head
- T206 McGinley
- T206 Lumley
- T206 Sheckard
- T206 White throwing
- T206 Mystery Player (Boston) borders completely gone.
- T205 Otis Crandall (variation)
- T202 Briscoe lord (side panel card) 

78 T206 technically Poor commons (most are not THAT bad) - $750
67 T206 technically Fair, F/G or G Commons - $800
53 T206 technically G+ G/VG, VG or VG+ commons (I tried to be objective, but a few have ink/pencil marks) - $SOLD.
6 T206 Vg/Ex commons (bridwell cap, payne throw, Schlei bat, Barger, Grimshaw, Merritt) - $240

T206 - Semitough cards - 7 cards - $140
Pelty horiz. - Poor
Powers - F/G
Dummy Taylor - Poor
Lundgren KC - Good
Burch Batting - G/VG (but has small ink and pencil mark on back)
Pattee - Poor
Lobert - Poor

T222 - Baseball Series Lot (2 cards both technically Poor but presentable) - Schang, Hamilton - $SOLD.

1914 Piedmont Art Stamps Issue - Baseball Series.  A very rare, obscure issue with many HOFers.  List of players:

NOW LISTED IN SEPARATELY....

Non-sports:
78 Famita Cigarettes - Actress Series - Conditions range from Poor to NM (avg. about VG) - $200.  Or 10 randomly selected cards - $30.

This post will continue to be updated with more items....first email to [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url] that commits gets the lot(s).

Best,
Scott

Sorry for disappearing on everyone.  I've been fighting one heck of a virus - but finally seem to be on the mend.

I have many, many PMs to get to....if you sent one, you will get a reply but it may take a day or two - assuming that I continue to improve.  If you still haven't gotten an answer by this weekend just send a gentle reminder.

Best,
Scott

Bump for two reasons:

1) to ask for help in identifying two unknown piedmont art stamps

2) because new details and photos have been / are being added.
I will take the t222's if they are still available.
The "unidentified" subjects are Merkel and Egan. They are both cataloged.
Pm sent on Rowan and Egan.  Thanks!
